<UL><LI>To provide advice and support to heads of service/managers on health and safety issues&nbsp
column3:
• To operate a duty officer scheme to ensure competent advice is available at all times
  • To interpret legislation and advise on the impact on existing practice
  • To develop policies, guidance and standards on health and safety
  • To monitor and audit health and safety standards within the council
  • To review and evaluate contractors' health and safety policies by applying council standards in order to accept or reject tenders
  • To investigate accidents and incidents and prepare reports making recommendations for remedial/preventative action
  • To provide health and safety training
  • To review occupational health provision within the council
